title: Roast pork with butternut squash
ingredients: ['1.12kg boneless pork loin roast', '1 teaspoon garlic granules', 'salt and pepper to taste', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '125ml dry white wine', '275g butternut squash, cubed', '1 large onion, sliced', '125ml apple sauce', '1 tablespoon Dijon mustard', '1 tablespoon soy sauce', '110g dark brown soft sugar', '1/2 teaspoon ground cinnamon']
